Job Description: JOB DESCRIPTION OF ACCOUNTANT AND ADMINISTRATIVE  OBJECTIVES OF THE POSITION     • Responsible for the financial management of the Indonesian company, ensuring that overseas subsidiaries operate in a standardized manner that meets both local management requirements and the control requirements of the company headquarters;     • Some administrative supporting work   MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES AND KEY ACTIVITIES   1. Develop and optimize various financial management, accounting systems and financial work processes based on the local financial and taxation laws and regulations and applicable accounting standards of Indonesian companies and implement them;   2. According to the requirements of the company headquarters, organize the annual audit, annual budget and final accounts, and annual board of directors financial report of the Indonesian company;   3. Organize the daily accounting of the Indonesian company, and prepare and submit daily and monthly statements that meet the consolidated requirements of the company's headquarters according to the requirements of the headquarters;    4. According to the requirements of the company headquarters, manage funds well, coordinate and handle relationships with banks, organize the preparation of Indonesian company's capital budget and standardize its implementation, and ensure the safety of fund transactions between subsidiaries and the company headquarters;    5. According to the tax policies of the country where the Indonesian company is located, carry out various tax-related planning and management work to reduce tax risks;    6. Provide timely feedback to the company headquarters on operational, financial and other risk warning information of the Indonesian company;    7. Other tasks assigned by the company         JOB REQUIREMENTS  Education:   • Finance-related majors, familiar with local financial and taxation laws and regulations, local accounting standards, and local import and export business accounting rules;    • Fluent in Chinese or EnglishWorking Experience and Skills• More than two years of overall accounting and accounting work experience;;• Proficient in using computers to create spreadsheets -• Honest, steady, strong sense of responsibility, good at communication and   coordination, and have good professionalism• Applicants with working experience in Chinese-funded companies will be given priority PT HENGHE YONGSHENG INDO is the branch of Guangdong Henghe Yongsheng Group Co., LTD in Indonesia. (Click this link for more information: https://www.henghe-group.com/)Guangdong Henghe Yongsheng Group Co., LTD. is leading enterprise specializing in R&D, production and sales of emulsions for coating in China, founded in 1992. we have been focus on water-based emulsion manufacturing 30 years, we are the pioneer of safe and environment friendly chemical products supplying and has gained a number of patents.Our products are widely used in interior and exterior architectural coatings, water-based wood coatings, waterproof coatings, water-based industrial coatings and other fields. We continue to provide stable and high-quality emulsions to our corporate customers, have built long-term partnership with world-class clients .Guangdong Henghe Yongsheng Group Co., LTD. has five subsidiaries in China: Guangdong Henghe Yongsheng Industrial Co., Ltd., Guangzhou Henghe New Material Co., LTD., Guangzhou Aiman Chemical Co., Ltd., Anhui Henghe New Material Co., Ltd., and Sichuang Henghe New Material Co.LTD.

Menyiapkan laporan tentang status alat berat dan rekomendasi untuk perbaikan atau penggantian.Koordinasi dengan Departemen Lain: Bekerja sama dengan departemen lain, seperti operasi dan pengadaan, untuk memastikan ketersediaan alat berat yang diperlukan.Pelatihan: Memberikan pelatihan dan bimbingan kepada teknisi pemula dan anggota tim terkait pemeliharaan dan perbaikan alat berat. Kualifikasi dan Keterampilan:Pengalaman minimal 10 tahun dalam pemeliharaan dan perbaikan alat berat.Keahlian dalam sistem mekanik, hidrolik, dan elektrik alat berat.Kemampuan untuk menggunakan alat diagnostik dan perangkat lunak terkait.Pengetahuan tentang standar keselamatan kerja dan prosedur operasional standar.Keterampilan komunikasi dan kepemimpinan yang baik.Kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim maupun secara mandiri.Pendidikan minimal SMK/Diploma dalam bidang mekanik, elektro, atau yang relevan.Sertifikasi profesional (jika ada) dalam pemeliharaan alat berat.

Facility: Retail Aksesori Gadget, Head Store, Operasional
Job Description: Bintang adalah perusahaan nasional penyedia teknologi penunjang kehidupan, dengan ragam produk berkualitas, yang dekat dengan masyarakat dan mendukung perekonomian Indonesia. Bintang menyediakan aksesori gadget, aksesori kecantikan, stationary dan beragam produk teknologi yang berkualitas dengan konsep swalayan retail yang tersebar di seluruh Indonesia. Bintang menjunjung tinggi budaya Berkolaborasi, Integritas, Niat Baik, Tumbuh, Akuntabel, Nilai Tambah dan Gigih dalam seluruh aktifitas bisnisnya.Untuk pengembangan bisnis, Bintang mencari Head Store yang bertugas untuk memastikan kesesuaian barang masuk dan keluar toko, pendisplayan, kebersihan & kerapihan produk, memonitor transaksi di kasir berjalan sesuai dengan prosedur, menjamin kemudahan penanganan kebutuhan pelanggan dan mengembangkan staff dalam memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik untuk pelanggan, dengan tujuan meningkatkan kepuasan pelanggan & meningkatkan performa Perusahaan.Kualifikasi: Pendidikan minimal D3 atau sederajatMemiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun sebagai Kepala Toko di bidang retailBerdomisili di Surabaya dan bersedia ditempatkan di seluruh cabang Toko BintangMempunyai pengetahuan tentang produk aksesori gadget akan menjadi nilai tambahMempunyai pengetahuan tentang display produk, transaksi di kasir, pelayanan di Customer Service dan penjualan di toko offline dan onlineMempunyai pengalaman dan mampu memimpin tim yang besarBersedia bekerja dengan system shiftMampu mengoperasikan Microsoft Office dengan baikMempunyai kemampuan berkomunikasi yang baikBerpenampilan rapi

Job Description :Mengembangkan dan meningkatkan rencana pengembangan bisnis melalui uji tuntas, analisis dan pemahaman riset pasar.Mencari potensi peluang bisnis dengan tujuan mengembangkan bisnis Jasa Konsultan manajemen eksplorasi dan pertambangan namun tidak terbatas untuk peluang bisnis lainnya seperti akusisi tambang dan bisnis jasa angkutan laut (tongkang) akan lebih disukaiMengembangkan Prosedur bisnis di dalam Perusahaan untuk memastikan setiap kegiatan berjalan sesuai dengan prosedur yang telah di terapkan.Berkolaborasi dengan tim teknis, finance dan legal untuk memastikan setiap peluang bisnis yang masuk kedalam perusahan telah di lakukan koordinasi dan disepakati untuk di eskalasi ke management sehingga peluang bisnis dapat di lanjutkan ke tahap berikutnyaMelakukan negosiasi dan finalisasi kesepakatan dengan market dan supplier sesuai dengan pedoman dan kebijakan kontrak PerusahaanMempersiapkan proposal bisnis serta proyeksi keuntungan bisnis untuk jangka Panjang.Kualifikasi :1. Min 3 tahun pengalaman sebagai Business Development di industry pertambangan2. Pemahaman yang baik mengenai operasional kegiatan jasa kontraktor eksplorasi dan pertambangan namun tidak terbatas untuk operasional kegiatan akuisisi tambang dan jasa angkutan laut (tongkang) akan lebih disukai3. Mempunyai keahlian dalam membuat laporan dan pengolahan data4. Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dengan calon pelanggan, klien, tim, dan juga presentasi di hadapan klien5. Meningkatkan dan memelihara hubungan dengan potensial client baru dan eksisting serta dapat mengembangkan peluang bisnis yang potensial yang dapat berdampak positif bagi perusahaan6. Mampu membuat proyeksi dan strategi peluang bisnis dalam suatu dokumen presentasiKriteria Khusus : Memiliki Analisa bisnis yang kuat (pembuatan proyeksi bisnis)Memiliki kemampuan dalam pengolahan data dalam Microsoft excelNegosiasi dan komunikasi yang baikTeliti dan RajinLatar belakang akutansi dan dari Industri Tambang nasional lebih disukaiLatar belakang akuntasi dan dari Perusahaan FMCG nasional lebih disukai

We are seeking a highly qualified and experienced Operational Manager to oversee multiple restaurant brands under our company. As an Operational Manager, you will be responsible for managing the day-to-day operations of several restaurants, ensuring efficient processes, maintaining high-quality standards, and delivering exceptional customer experiences across all brands. If you have a strong background in restaurant management, excellent leadership skills, and the ability to multitask effectively, we encourage you to apply for this position.Primary Responsibilities:Oversee the operational activities of multiple restaurant brands, including customer service, food preparation, cleanliness, and overall performance.Develop and implement standardized operational procedures to ensure consistency and efficiency across all restaurant locations.Monitor and evaluate key performance indicators (KPIs) to drive operational excellence and meet business objectives.Collaborate with the marketing and branding teams to maintain a consistent brand image and customer experience.Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations, food handling guidelines, and local licensing requirements.Conduct regular audits and inspections to maintain quality control and identify areas for improvement.Train and mentor restaurant managers and staff members, providing guidance on operational best practices and customer service.Collaborate with the HR department to recruit, hire, and onboard qualified restaurant managers and staff members.Analyze financial reports, budgets, and sales data to optimize profitability and reduce costs across restaurant brands.Develop and maintain relationships with suppliers, vendors, and other business partners to ensure the timely delivery of goods and services.Qualifications:Minimum of 5 years of experience in restaurant management, with a proven track record of overseeing multiple locations or brands.Strong knowledge and understanding of restaurant operations, including customer service, food preparation, and quality control.Excellent leadership and people management skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire teams.Demonstrated experience in developing and implementing standardized operational procedures.Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to effectively interact with stakeholders at all levels.Strong business acumen and financial management skills to analyze reports, budgets, and financial data.In-depth knowledge of health and safety regulations, food handling practices, and licensing requirements.Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred.Previous experience in managing diverse restaurant brands or concepts is an advantage.

Job Title: Smelter - Instrumentation Position (Walk in Interview - Jakarta)
Job Description: Amman Mineral Industri at Sumbawa Island in Indonesia has a Smelter complex where Copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines, is converted through a process of smelting and electro refining to copper cathodes of specified purity for shipment to customers. Sulphuric acid and precious metals such as gold, silver and selenium are produced as by products for sale to customers. The operations require a Raw Material Handling Plant (MHP) for receiving, storing and blending the copper concentrate and Utilities to support operations. Position to be open:Sr. Spv Instrumentation Supt. - Instrumentation - Sap/Utilities/Slag ConcentratorField EngineeretcRequirements:Bachelor/Diploma Engineer/Trade Certificate in Electronics/E&C/Instrumentation and control or related studyGPA (IPK) min 3.2 of 4.0Fluency in both written and spoken English; and computer literateWilling to locate on site at Sumbawa Barat.Hiring Process:Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted and invited to the Walk-in-InterviewWalk-in-Interview will be conducted in Jakarta (Week 4 of March 2024)

Sabtu 08.30-13.00About Us :PT. Intisarana Adisejahtera merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak dibidang penyedia alat pemanas air bertenaga matahari berteknologi Jerman dan Dispenser Reverse Osmosis yang selalu terdepan dalam inovasi, menghasilkan produk-produk yang berkualitas namun terjangkau.Inti Solar Water Heater adalah spesialis solar water heater yang berpengalaman sejak tahun 1960 dan terjual lebih dari 70.000 untit di seluruh Indonesia. Pioneer teknologi tabung vacuum sebagai yang pertama di Indonesia sejak tahun 1997. Berkantor pusat di Jakarta Utara dan memiliki 5 cabang yaitu Pluit (Jakarta), Serpong (Tangerang), Bandung, Surabaya dan Bali serta jaringan distribusi dan service center yang tersebar diseluruh Indonesia. Dipercaya oleh pengembang ternama di Indonesia, seperti Summarecon, Lippo Group, Lavon, Serpong Garden, dan lainnya. Inti Solar mendapatkan penghargaan Superbrands 2021, 2022 dan 2023 di kategori Solar Water Heater. Inti Solar mendapat penghargaan Top Brand 2022 dan 2023 di kategori Solar Water Heater. Inti Solar dinobatkan sebagai Best Retailer dalam ajang penghargaan BizX 2023 di Nashville, Amerika Serikat.

Job Title: Smelter - Mechanical Position (Walk in Interview - Surabaya)
Job Description: Amman Mineral Industri at Sumbawa Island in Indonesia has a Smelter complex including the Smelters, Refinery, Sulphuric Acid Plant, Precious Metal Plant. Copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines, is converted through a process of smelting and electro refining to copper cathodes of specified purity for shipment to customers in Indonesia as well as other parts of the world. Sulphur dioxide produced during operations is converted to sulphuric acid and precious metals such as gold, silver and selenium are produced as by products for sale to customers. The operations require a Raw Material Handling Plant for receiving, storing and blending the copper concentrate and Utilities to support operations. The smelter complex has many capital-intensive and sophisticated plant and machinery and their control systems that help coordinate the complex interlinkages of various stages of the copper smelting process as well as the process plants for its by-products.Position to be open:Sr.Spv Mechanical MaintenanceSr.Spv Mechanical Maintenance PlanningSpv Mechanical MaintenanceSpecialist Mechanical MaintenanceetcRequirements:Graduate in Mechanical EngineeringGPA (IPK) min 3.2 of 4.0Fluency in both written and spoken English; and computer literateWilling to locate on site at Sumbawa Barat.Hiring Process:Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted and invited to the Walk-in-InterviewWalk-in-Interview will be conducted in Surabaya (Week 4 of March 2024)

Job Title: Smelter - Electrical Position (Walk in interview - Jakarta)
Job Description: Amman Mineral Industri at Sumbawa Island in Indonesia has a Smelter complex including the Smelters, Electro Refinery (ER), Sulphuric Acid Plant (SAP), Precious Metal Refinery (PMR), Copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines, is converted through a process of smelting and electro refining to copper cathodes of specified purity for shipment to customers in Indonesia as well as other parts of the world. Sulphur dioxide produced during operations is converted to sulphuric acid and precious metals such as gold, silver and selenium are produced as by products for sale to customers. The operations require a Raw Material Handling Plant (MHP) for receiving, storing and blending the copper concentrate and Utilities to support operations. Position to be open:Sr. Spv. ElectricalSupt. We are expanding our team! Ksatria is seeking highly motivated individuals, including nurses, doctors, hospital staff, and experienced software implementors, to join us as Software Implementation Specialists. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in deploying and demonstrating our health information software, aimed at enhancing patient care across Indonesia and overseas. Responsibilities: Implement health information software to meet the specific needs of our customers' healthcare facilities. Work closely with our software development team to address technical challenges and enhance software functionality. Conduct training sessions for healthcare staff on effectively utilizing the health information software to improve patient care and workflow efficiency. Uphold data privacy regulations and ensure the confidentiality of patient information. Assess the software's impact and suggest improvements for optimal performance. Analytical Skills: Possess strong analytical abilities to evaluate complex data and workflows, identify issues, and develop solutions that enhance system performance and user experience. (Preferred) Project Management: Experience in managing projects, including planning, allocating resources, and handling risks, will be highly advantageous for successful software implementation in healthcare settings. Requirements: Degree in Medicine, Nursing, or relevant healthcare field; or significant experience in software implementation within healthcare settings. Demonstrated experience in implementing health information software in a clinical environment. Excellent English communication skills, both verbal and written. Profound understanding of data privacy laws, clinical workflows, medical terminology, and healthcare operations. Commitment to maintaining patient confidentiality is paramount. Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team. We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. A dynamic, fast-paced work environment in the healthcare sector. An opportunity to significantly impact patient care through technology. If you are passionate about leveraging technology to enhance healthcare and have a successful track record in health information software implementation, we invite you to apply for this exciting role!

We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Marketing Specialist to join our team. We are seeking a highly qualified and experienced Operational Manager to oversee multiple restaurant brands under our company. As an Operational Manager, you will be responsible for managing the day-to-day operations of several restaurants, ensuring efficient processes, maintaining high-quality standards, and delivering exceptional customer experiences across all brands. If you have a strong background in restaurant management, excellent leadership skills, and the ability to multitask effectively, we encourage you to apply for this position.Primary Responsibilities:Oversee the operational activities of multiple restaurant brands, including customer service, food preparation, cleanliness, and overall performance.Develop and implement standardized operational procedures to ensure consistency and efficiency across all restaurant locations.Monitor and evaluate key performance indicators (KPIs) to drive operational excellence and meet business objectives.Collaborate with the marketing and branding teams to maintain a consistent brand image and customer experience.Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations, food handling guidelines, and local licensing requirements.Conduct regular audits and inspections to maintain quality control and identify areas for improvement.Train and mentor restaurant managers and staff members, providing guidance on operational best practices and customer service.Collaborate with the HR department to recruit, hire, and onboard qualified restaurant managers and staff members.Analyze financial reports, budgets, and sales data to optimize profitability and reduce costs across restaurant brands.Develop and maintain relationships with suppliers, vendors, and other business partners to ensure the timely delivery of goods and services.Qualifications:Minimum of 5 years of experience in restaurant management, with a proven track record of overseeing multiple locations or brands.Strong knowledge and understanding of restaurant operations, including customer service, food preparation, and quality control.Excellent leadership and people management skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire teams.Demonstrated experience in developing and implementing standardized operational procedures.Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to effectively interact with stakeholders at all levels.Strong business acumen and financial management skills to analyze reports, budgets, and financial data.In-depth knowledge of health and safety regulations, food handling practices, and licensing requirements.Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred.Previous experience in managing diverse restaurant brands or concepts is an advantage.

Sabtu 08.30-13.00About Us :PT. Intisarana Adisejahtera merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak dibidang penyedia alat pemanas air bertenaga matahari berteknologi Jerman dan Dispenser Reverse Osmosis yang selalu terdepan dalam inovasi, menghasilkan produk-produk yang berkualitas namun terjangkau.Inti Solar Water Heater adalah spesialis solar water heater yang berpengalaman sejak tahun 1960 dan terjual lebih dari 70.000 untit di seluruh Indonesia. Pioneer teknologi tabung vacuum sebagai yang pertama di Indonesia sejak tahun 1997. Berkantor pusat di Jakarta Utara dan memiliki 5 cabang yaitu Pluit (Jakarta), Serpong (Tangerang), Bandung, Surabaya dan Bali serta jaringan distribusi dan service center yang tersebar diseluruh Indonesia. Dipercaya oleh pengembang ternama di Indonesia, seperti Summarecon, Lippo Group, Lavon, Serpong Garden, dan lainnya. Inti Solar mendapatkan penghargaan Superbrands 2021, 2022 dan 2023 di kategori Solar Water Heater. Inti Solar mendapat penghargaan Top Brand 2022 dan 2023 di kategori Solar Water Heater. Inti Solar dinobatkan sebagai Best Retailer dalam ajang penghargaan BizX 2023 di Nashville, Amerika Serikat.

Job Title: Smelter - Mechanical Position (Walk in Interview - Surabaya)
Job Description: Amman Mineral Industri at Sumbawa Island in Indonesia has a Smelter complex including the Smelters, Refinery, Sulphuric Acid Plant, Precious Metal Plant. Copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines, is converted through a process of smelting and electro refining to copper cathodes of specified purity for shipment to customers in Indonesia as well as other parts of the world. Sulphur dioxide produced during operations is converted to sulphuric acid and precious metals such as gold, silver and selenium are produced as by products for sale to customers. The operations require a Raw Material Handling Plant for receiving, storing and blending the copper concentrate and Utilities to support operations. The smelter complex has many capital-intensive and sophisticated plant and machinery and their control systems that help coordinate the complex interlinkages of various stages of the copper smelting process as well as the process plants for its by-products.Position to be open:Sr.Spv Mechanical MaintenanceSr.Spv Mechanical Maintenance PlanningSpv Mechanical MaintenanceSpecialist Mechanical MaintenanceetcRequirements:Graduate in Mechanical EngineeringGPA (IPK) min 3.2 of 4.0Fluency in both written and spoken English; and computer literateWilling to locate on site at Sumbawa Barat.Hiring Process:Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted and invited to the Walk-in-InterviewWalk-in-Interview will be conducted in Surabaya (Week 4 of March 2024)

Job Title: Smelter - Instrumentation Position (Walk in Interview - Surabaya)
Job Description: Amman Mineral Industri at Sumbawa Island in Indonesia has a Smelter complex where Copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines, is converted through a process of smelting and electro refining to copper cathodes of specified purity for shipment to customers. Sulphuric acid and precious metals such as gold, silver and selenium are produced as by products for sale to customers. The operations require a Raw Material Handling Plant (MHP) for receiving, storing and blending the copper concentrate and Utilities to support operations. Position to be open:Sr. Spv Instrumentation Supt. - Instrumentation - Sap/Utilities/Slag ConcentratorField EngineeretcRequirements:Bachelor/Diploma Engineer/Trade Certificate in Electronics/E&C/Instrumentation and control or related studyGPA (IPK) min 3.2 of 4.0Fluency in both written and spoken English; and computer literateWilling to locate on site at Sumbawa Barat.Hiring Process:Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted and invited to the Walk-in-InterviewWalk-in-Interview will be conducted in Surabaya (Week 4 of March 2024)

Bermula di tahun 1971, AMBICO mengawali perjalanannya sebagai pelopor industri pengolahan porang dan tepung glucomanan menjadi produk makan sehat (low kalori dan High fiber) seperti Konnyaku, Shirataki dan lainnya.AMBICO dengan gebrakannya sebagai perusahaan pertama di dunia yang memproduksi Konnyaku dan Shirataki dalam bentuk kering dan basah, berhasil menarik perhatian dan minat pasar lokal maupun internasional terutama di Asia dan Eropa akan pentingnya makanan sehat.AMBICO melalui inivasi yang berkelanjutan dan akan terus berkembang guna memperluas pasar lokal dan internasional. Job Description: Teach Indonesia School is a character-building and Biblical-based school located in North Jakarta. In welcoming new academic year 2024/2025, we are seeking a highly motivated and qualified High School English and Homeroom Teacher to join our school, whom is passionate about educating young people and has experience in teaching English to students in grades 7-12. The successful candidate will be responsible for attending  class as homeroom teacher and teaching English language and literature to junior-senior high school students, developing effective lesson plans, building students skills, evaluating student progress, managing students and classroom, and maintaining classroom discipline. Qualifications:Age: preferably 25-38 years oldEducation: Minimum Bachelor's degree in English, Education, or a related field is required. Experience: The candidate should have at least two years of experience in teaching secondary school students and teaching English as a second language. Experience teaching students from diverse backgrounds and abilities. Having teaching experiences using International curriculum/materials such as IGCSE/GAC, is preferred.Knowledge: The candidate should have a competent capability and understanding of English language and literature for speaking, listening, reading and writing as well as analysis of literature works. Must have a strong understanding of English language arts, including grammar, vocabulary, speech/presentation/public speaking, journals, academic reports and research, as well as English learning skills, tools and devices.Skills: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills are essential. Must be able to create engaging lessons, manage classroom behavior effectively, effective teaching-learning process/methods, and assess student progress. Proficiency in technology, including the use of educational software, multimedia tools and online learning platforms, is highly desirable. Classroom Management: The candidate should have the ability to manage a classroom of high school students effectively, maintaining discipline and ensuring an environment conducive to learning.Personal Qualities: A passion for education, a positive attitude, a willingness to learn and grow, and a commitment to student success are essential. Professionalism: The candidate should have a professional demeanor, with the ability to maintain good work ethics, work collaboratively with colleagues, actively participate in professional development opportunities, and adhere to the school’s vision, mission and values. If you meet the above qualifications and are passionate about the prospect of teaching upper level English, we encourage you to apply for this position. Send your CV and credentials to us.Thank you.

Job Summary:As a Maintenance Operator at our ice cream factory, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth operation of our production machinery and facilities. Your primary responsibility will be to conduct regular maintenance checks, diagnose and repair mechanical issues, and perform preventive maintenance tasks to minimize downtime. Additionally, you will collaborate with other team members to optimize production efficiency and uphold safety standards.Responsibilities:Perform routine maintenance tasks on production machinery, including but not limited to freezers, mixers, fillers, and packaging equipment.Conduct inspections to identify any mechanical or electrical issues and troubleshoot problems efficiently.Repair or replace defective parts, components, or systems as needed to restore equipment functionality.Execute preventive maintenance procedures according to established schedules to prevent equipment breakdowns and ensure reliability.Maintain accurate records of maintenance activities, including work performed, parts used, and equipment condition.Collaborate with production supervisors and operators to prioritize maintenance tasks and minimize disruptions to production schedules.Adhere to safety protocols and regulations at all times to create a secure working environment for yourself and your colleagues.Assist in the installation of new equipment and machinery, ensuring proper setup and integration with existing systems.Participate in training programs to stay updated on new technologies, equipment upgrades, and maintenance techniques.Support continuous improvement initiatives by suggesting efficiency enhancements, cost-saving measures, and process optimizations. Qualifications:High school diploma or equivalent; technical certification or vocational training in maintenance or a related field preferred.Proven experience as a maintenance technician or operator in a manufacturing or food processing environment, preferably in the dairy or frozen food industry.Strong mechanical aptitude and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to diagnose and repair electrical, hydraulic, and pneumatic systems.Familiarity with maintenance tools, equipment, and techniques, including hand tools, power tools, and precision instruments.Familiar with PLC siemens & ABBFamiliar with trouble shooting pumpKnowledge of safety protocols and regulations related to machinery operation and maintenance.Excellent communication and teamwork abilities, with the capacity to collaborate effectively with colleagues across departments.Flexibility to work in shifts and respond to emergency maintenance situations outside of regular hours.Attention to detail and a commitment to quality craftsmanship in performing maintenance tasks.Physical stamina and dexterity to work in a fast-paced production environment and lift heavy equipment or parts as needed.Problem-solving mindset and a proactive approach to identifying and resolving maintenance issues.Available work shift & placement in GIIC Deltamas Cikarang

Job Purpose:Support the HSER Manager in identifying, mapping, classifying and monitoring mitigating actions for the risk management in IGP Projects according to the governance adopted by PTVI. This role acts as the 2nd line of defense for the company's risk treatment process.Accountabilities:1. Validate all the decision taken from the risk assessment session conducted for each project, to facilitate the process of identification and evaluation potential risks related with the projects together with the project team, in accordance with the procedure described in SPE system2. Work closely (as possible) with stakeholders to understand their concerns and expectations regarding project risks3. Collect all the information required from the project team and conduct or run qualitative and quantitative risk analyzes to assess the probability and impact of adverse events4. Assess the contingencies value of high and very high risks and ensure that project budgets take into account necessary data5. Validate the action plans to mitigate identified risks, including prevention, transfer, mitigation and acceptance strategies6. Clearly and effectively communicate the results of risk analyses, mitigation plans, and risk-related updates to the project team and stakeholders (target audience : BoD, Head of Mines Project, Project Directors)7. Implement continuous monitoring systems to evaluate the effectiveness of mitigation plans and identify new risks as the project progresses8. Evaluate all the data recorded on the system and maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all identified risks, their classifications, mitigation plans and implementation status9. Participate in post-implementation reviews to analyze the effectiveness of mitigation strategies and propose improvements for future projectsRequirement:1. Bachelor Degree (S1) Engineering2. Minimum 11 years work experience3. Auditor courses in ISO's standards is preferred4. Occupational Safety and Risk Management Courses is preferred

PT. BANGUNPERKASA ADHITAMASENTRA telah membuktikan diri sebagai bagian dari pengembangan negeri melalui upaya menciptakan inovasi produk papan semen untuk bahan bangunan yang ramah lingkungan, tidak mudah retak, tahan Api serta harga yang terjangkau. Komitmen kami yaitu menciptakan produk papan semen pengganti triplek yang handal, kuat, tidak meresap air, permukaan halus serta menjadi pilihan masyarakat Indonesia. Job Title: Regulatory Officer dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) – Alat Kesehatan
Facility: Nusa Asia menawarkan paket gaji dan insentif yang kompetitif, Kesempatan belajar dan berkembang dengan tenaga professional, Continuous Improvement adalah pedoman kami
Job Description: Nusa Asia Medika (Lokasi Green Lake City, Tangerang) membuka lowongan untuk  Regulatory Officer dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) – Medical Device (Alat Kesehatan)  Deskripsi Pekerjaan Regulatory Officer dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) : Menjadi Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) perusahaan yang bergerak dalam bidang Alat Kesehatan.Mengikuti perkembangan terbaru dari rangkaian produk Perusahaan. Mendukung pengajuan pendaftaran, Izin Distribusi Alat Kesehatan (IDAK), Izin Edar Alat Kesehatan Luar Negeri, Sertifikasi dan Lisensi CDAKB, Lisensi TKDN, dan perpanjangan dengan tenggat waktu yang ketat untuk memastikan sertifikat produk sesuai dengan kode/ ruang lingkup produk.Aplikasi e-Report untuk Alkes dan distribusi Alkes oleh produsen atau Distributor Alkes.Secara proaktif melacak semua registrasi, menyimpan catatan registrasi, dan mulai aktivitas pembaruan yang tepat untuk memastikan bahwa registrasi saat ini tidak kadaluarsa dan membahayakan penjualan di Indonesia.Mengikuti perkembangan Peraturan Alat Kesehatan dan memberikan panduan kepada tim pengembangan produk terkait data dan informasi yang diperlukan untuk mempersiapkan pendaftaran tersebut.Mendukung inspeksi regulasi oleh badan Regulator/ Badan yang diberitahukan setempat jika diperlukan.Berkoordinasi dengan principals untuk menginformasikan kepada pihak berwenang di Indonesia mengenai perubahan pada produk yang didaftarkan.Melaksanakan tugas-tugas regulasi/ kualitas lainnya yang didelegasikan oleh manajer atau manajemen PT. Nusa Asia Medika.Apabila seluruh kegiatan yang berhubungan dengan Regulatory telah terselesaikan dengan baik, memberikan dukungan untuk aktifitas penjualan dan/atau pemasaran perusahaan. Termasuk di dalamnya adalah untuk membuat Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) perusahaan, memberikan pelatihan/training kepada seluruh karyawan perusahaan atas SOP ini, dan memastikan bahwa SOP berjalan dengan baik. Persyaratan:Memiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 2-3 tahun di bidang Regulatory Affairs untuk produk alat KesehatanMemiliki setidaknya gelar Sarjana Farmasi dari Universitas yang terakreditasiMemiliki kemampuan komunikasi lisan dan tulisan yang sangat baik dengan kemampuan Bahasa inggris yang baikKemampuan untuk bekerja secara mandiri dengan pengawasan minimal, mengatur, memprioritaskan, dan mengelola beberapa proyek secara efektifSikap positif, perhatian yang kuat terhadap detail, dan kemampuan untuk memecahkan masalah secara mandiriPemahaman yang komprehensif tentang kegiatan regulasi dan bagaimana dampaknya terhdap produk dan/atau proses lainnya.Pengetahuan tentang sistem manajemen mutu, kompilasi file teknis, dan persyaratan peraturan perangkat medis Indonesia.

Anda juga akan bekerja sama dengan berbagai tim untuk memastikan berjalannya operasional produksi dengan baik, kepatuhan terhadap protokol keselamatan, dan optimalisasi proses-produksi.  Kualifikasi yang cepat dan tepat, terutama perihal penyelesaian masalah yang terjadi selama proses produksi di dalam perusahaanMemiliki wawasan yang luas tentang proses pengolahan pabrik & keselamatan kerja. Tanggung Jawab:Membantu Manajer Pabrik untuk mencapai target produksi sesuai standar kualitas.Berkoordinasi dengan kepala departemen dan melakukan pengawasan pada proses produksi secara We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Marketing Specialist to join our team. This individual will play a crucial role in driving our business growth by executing effective marketing strategies, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and optimizing our marketing efforts. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both digital and traditional marketing, along with a passion for understanding and reaching our target audience. Key Responsibilities:-Strategy & Planning: Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies, ensuring alignment with company goals and the target audience's needs.-Content Creation: Draft compelling content for various marketing channels, including blogs, newsletters, social media, and the company website. Ensure content is both engaging and in line with brand voice and style.-Digital Marketing: Oversee online marketing campaigns, monitor their performance, and refine strategies based on feedback and analytics.-Creative Thinking: Continuously brainstorm and come up with innovative marketing ideas and campaigns that differentiate us from competitors and resonate with our audience.-Market Research: Stay abreast of market trends, customer preferences, and competitor data to identify opportunities and challenges.-Product Importing & Logistics: Coordinate the import of products, ensuring all customs and regulatory requirements are met. Handle the logistics to ensure timely and cost-effective delivery to our facilities or direct to consumers.-Branding: Uphold brand consistency across all marketing channels, ensuring every touchpoint feels uniquely "us" and speaks to our values and identity.-Event Management: Represent the company at promotional events, trade shows, and workshops, ensuring our presence is both notable and aligned with our brand.-Branch Coordination: Act as the primary liaison between our Saudi and Indonesian branches, ensuring seamless communication, collaboration, and alignment in marketing strategies.-Budget Management: Efficiently manage the marketing budget, ensuring every dollar spent contributes to our goals and offers a strong return on investment.  Qualifications:-Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.-5+ years of experience in a marketing role with a proven track record of success.-Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms such as Google Analytics, SEO, SEM, and social media advertising.-Strong analytical, organizational, and project management skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English & Bahasa.-Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Familiarity with the latest trends, technologies, and methodologies in graphic design, web design, production, etc. How to Apply:To apply for this position, please send your resume, a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, and a portfolio (if applicable) to [email protected].  Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Job SummaryResponsible for the full spectrum of account receivable activities; Responsible for all aspects of fixed asset accounting; Support on Indonesia companies’ daily process operations and entry posting. This position will report to Finance Supervisor.Responsibilities: Account Receivable (AR):Issue tax invoices and perform 3-way matching of sales contract/order, goods delivery note and tax invoices;Post accounting entries of revenue and AR transactions onto ERP system timely and correctly;Post accouting entries of AR collection and clearance onto ERP system timely and correctly;Bind and archive copies of sales contract/order, goods delivery note, tax invoices and cash collection bankslips properly and timely as JE supportings;Prepare monthly AR aging report to monitor outstanding payments and follow up with customers for timely collection;Prepare monthly intercompany transaction list and perform reconciliation with group companies;Perform monthly VAT output reconciliation with ERP accounting record. 2. Fixed Assets (FA):Extract CIP list from ERP system, circulate the list to respective departments to confirm receipt status and start-to-use date;Post accounting entries of transferring CIP to FA transactions onto ERP system and issue unique asset tag to each new added FA;Maintain FA record in ERP system and posting monthly depreciation accounting entries based on system‘s calculation;Post accounting entries of FA disposals (if any);Maintain Right-of-use asset record in ERP system and post lease accounting entries according to lease schedule reviewed by finance controlling team;Coordinate on intra-group FA transfer and prepare FA related information in monthly intercompany transaction list;Conduct regular physical checks of fixed assets and ensure proper tagging with unique asset codes. 3. Other support on process operation and entry posting:Assist in collecting reimbursement invoices and check reimbursement application form;Responsible for binding and filing of Journal entries and supporting documents (original copies of invoices, PO, DO, bank statements, etc.);Assist the supervisor in the monthly account closing activities;Assist in conducting monthly and annual stocktake;Assist in external audits and tax filing process, with directions from finance supervisor;Other ad-hoc activities assigned by the finance supervisor. Qualifications:Diploma or Bachelor Degree in Accounting or equivalentPreferably at least 5 years working experience in finance and accounting functionPrior experience in trading and manufacturing is highly preferredERP experience is a plusAbility to communicate effectively in English (spoken and written) Willing to work in Cikarang

4. Memaksimalkan fitur dan keunggulan CRM Perusahaan & Berkolaborasi dengan departemen/divisi lain yang membutuhkan data CRM. 
5. Memastikan bahwa data pelanggan ( User & Mitra ) disimpan dan dikelola dengan aman dan sesuai dengan regulasi privasi dan keamanan data yang berlaku.
6. Menerapkan strategi pemasaran dan promosi untuk meningkatkan loyalitas pelanggan (User & Mitra) dan memperoleh pelanggan baru.
7. Menyusun laporan dan menganalisis kinerja sistem CRM, dan memberikan rekomendasi untuk peningkatan di masa depan.

Tersedia jam fleksibel
Diperlukan 2-3 tahun pengalaman kerja yang relevan untuk posisi ini
Pelamar harus memiliki KTP

Amman Mineral Industri has a Flash Smelting Furnace (FSF), a Flash Converting Furnace (FCF), Anode Plant and associated utilities in its Copper Smelting unit located at the Sumbawa Island in Indonesia.  The smelters convert copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines in the same island, to copper anodes of the stipulated specification for supply to the Electro Refinery in the same complex for the production of copper cathodes.  The off-gas from the FSF and FCF is supplied to the Sulphuric Acid Plant. Position to be open:Operator UtilitiesOperator PowerhouseOperator FSF/FCFetcRequirements:Diploma Engineer/ Trade certificate in  Electrical/Mechanical Engineering or related studyGPA (IPK) min 3.2 of 4.0Fluency in both written and spoken English; and computer literateWilling to locate on site at Sumbawa Barat.Hiring Process:Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted and invited to the Walk-in-InterviewWalk-in-Interview will be conducted in Surabaya (Week 4 of March 2024)

Job Title: Graphic Designer - Web Content & Social Media
Job Description: **Please submit your portfolio via a link (Mandatory)**Job Description:We are looking for a creative and skilled Graphic Designer to join our marketing team. The ideal candidate will specialize in designing vibrant and engaging social media content, blog visuals, and homepage banners in a fast-paced working environment. You will play a key role in elevating our brand's online presence across various digital platforms.Responsibilities:- Social Media Content Creation: Design captivating graphics and layouts for our social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, Facebook) to boost engagement and follower growth.- Homepage Banners: Create dynamic and visually appealing banners for our website's homepage to highlight promotions, features, or news.- Blog Visuals: Produce compelling graphics for blog posts that align with our content themes and enhance reader experience.- Brand Consistency: Ensure all designs are consistent with our brand identity, including color schemes, fonts, and tone.- Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team to brainstorm creative ideas and translate marketing objectives into engaging visual concepts.- Feedback Incorporation: Revise and refine designs based on team feedback to meet project objectives.- Trend Research & Awareness: Stay updated on graphic design trends and incorporate new ideas into design projects to keep our content fresh and relevant. JOB REQUIREMENTSQualifications:- Proficient in Canva with a strong portfolio showcasing social media content, web graphics, and other relevant design work.- SkinCare lover. Strong knowledge of the beauty industry.- Experience with other graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator) is a plus.- Strong visual design skills with an eye for composition, color, and typography.- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.- Good English Communication- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.- Creative thinker with attention to detail and a passion for design.- Strong responsibility, organized, and attention to detail.- Korean language skill is a plus

About Jiva:Jiva is a venture incubated by OIam in late 2020 with a mission to transform smallholder farming and improve the lives of farmerIt provides four key services:  Offtake services: Direct procurement from farmers with transparency in prices and reliability in operations Input eCommerce: Sales of Agri inputs directly to farmers as well as to village-level entrepreneurs/retailers while improving the availability of products and creditsCredit services: Credit as a service to farmers, input retailers, and crop collectors for buying inputs and paying farmers in timeAdvisory platform: To educate farmers on best practices for growing their crops based on weather conditions and information like location, seed type, sowing date, etc. Jiva is focused on smallholder farmers as we believe they are key to the future of agriculture, humanity & the planet; however they face significant challenges:500 million smallholder farmers globally support over 2 billion people within their families. Yet they comprise the majority of the world’s poorest peopleSmallholder farmers produce 70% of the world’s food. Yet they comprise the world’s most undernourished, hungry populationThey are the most vulnerable to climate change which threatens up to 25% of crop yields Since starting operations in Q1 2021, Jiva has worked with over 40k smallholder farmers in Indonesia to procure over 150,000 MT of corn. We are looking to exponentially grow our input eCommerce business to over USD 100 Mn business in the next 3 years.  About Olam:Olam International is a leading food and agri-business supplying food, ingredients, feed, and fiber to over 19,800 customers worldwide. Our value chain spans over 60 countries and includes farming, processing, and distribution operations, as well as a sourcing network of 4.8 million farmers. Through its purpose to ‘Re-imagine Global Agriculture and Food Systems, Olam aims to address the many challenges involved in meeting the needs of a growing global population, while achieving a positive impact on farming communities, our planet, and all our stakeholders. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, Olam currently ranks among the top 30 largest primary listed companies in market capitalization on SGX-ST. About this opportunity:We are looking for an exceptional Fulfillment Executive, who is passionate about our mission, to lead the fulfillment of the Agri-Inputs e-Commerce business of Jiva Indonesia. The role will be based out of East Java, reporting directly to the National Fulfillment Manager. The venture is backed by Olam International, which has an unparalleled presence in rural communities and relationships with millions of smallholder farmers. It is uniquely positioned to drive profit with purpose: disrupting the agriculture industry and generating outsized financial returns, while creating a real impact for some of the world’s poorest farmers and their families, and the planet by promoting sustainable farming practices. What Jiva offers:Shape an entire Fulfillment line of startup and product in its early stage of growthMake a real difference in the lives of farmers, humanity, and our planetExperience an international adventure in frontier markets as this venture scales beyond Singapore, Indonesia, India, and across Asia and AfricaJoin a talented, passionate, and fun team from across the globeA diverse and inclusive environment with colleagues from around the worldCompetitive compensation and benefits (including base, bonus, and stock options)Upsides of a rapidly growing startup, with the financial security and strategic advantage of a global corporate backing What you will do:Work with fulfillment center (product management) to build and implement an improvement plan to meet critical warehouse and business needsDevelop a thorough, effective, and timely continuous improvement plan to meet our effectiveness & productivity targetsLead Kaizen events and other activities that execute the improvement plansProvide regular KPI reports with data and actions to measure progress against the plan objectivesWork with our IT & product team to design features that will help deliver the required productivity improvementsTrain Warehouse leadership and other key personnel on Lean conceptsDevelop shop floor experts capable of driving Lean & 5S in their areasMaintain a detailed understanding of Lean & 5S best practices, and share best practices and knowledge with the regional team. Who we are looking for:Extensive and proven experience of 5+ years in fulfillment of e-commerce (Agri inputs eCommerce experience will be an added plus)Extensive experience in a leadership role in the fulfillment of e-commerceStrong data analysis skills and knowledge of Microsoft ExcelHighly energetic and self-motivatedResults driven-focus on operations & scaleDemonstrated ability to handle multiple tasks, prioritize those tasks, and meet deadlinesAn articulate communicator with highly developed presentation and interpersonal skillsFluent and excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Bahasa are required

1. Membuat Agenda Kantor
Tugas Admin perkantoran yang pertama adalah membuat agenda kantor. Dimana hal tersebut merupakan tugas organisir yang sesuai dengan klasifikasi yang diinginkan. Menyiapkan agenda kantor membutuhkan komunikasi yang baik. Untuk menunjang pekerjaan hal tersebut.
2. Menyiapkan Surat Menyurat
Tugas selanjutnya yang dapat dilakukan oleh staff Admin perkantoran adalah menyiapkan surat menyurat. Biasanya menginput surat masuk serta membuat surat keluar.
3. Mengelola Dokumen Perkantoran
Tugas Admin perkantoran yang penting selanjutnya adalah mengelola dokumen perkantoran
4. Melakukan Penginputan Data
Pekerjaan fundamental ataupun yang bersifat klerikal atau administratif ini adalah tugas seorang Admin perkantoran yang cukup fundamental.
5. Membuat Perekapan Data
Data yang sudah masuk pastinya akan dilakukan perekapan. Hasilnya adalah data tersebut dapat menjadi keperluan perusahaan. Pastikan data direkap dengan aman. Pasalnya perekapan data juga mudah untuk dikelola. Setelah hal tersebut, kamu dapat merekap data baik secara fisik maupun digital.

Berikut adalah deskripsi pekerjaan Operator Live StreamBenefit Pekerjaan• Gaji pokok bulanan dan UM• BPJS Ketenagakerjaan• Libur 4 kali dalam satu bulan di hari Senin• Tunjangan Kinerja , Bonus Penjualan dan THR Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab :Mengatur dan mengoperasikan perangkat teknologi seperti kamera, mixer audio, dan software streaming untuk menghasilkan siaran langsung yang berkualitas tinggi.Memastikan koneksi internet stabil dan memantau jaringan untuk memastikan kualitas siaran tidak terganggu.Menyiapkan dan mengatur peralatan teknis seperti kamera, mikrofon, dan lampu untuk menjamin kualitas gambar dan suara yang optimal.Menjalin komunikasi dengan host acara dan tamu untuk memastikan informasi dan jadwal acara terpenuhi.Mengedit rekaman siaran langsung jika diperlukan dan menyimpan rekaman tersebut untuk digunakan kembali di masa depan.Menyediakan dukungan teknis selama acara berlangsung dan menangani masalah teknis yang terjadi selama siaran langsung.Menjalin hubungan baik dengan mitra dan pemangku kepentingan lainnya untuk memastikan kelancaran pelaksanaan acara.Syarat PekerjaanPendidikan minimal SMA atau setara.Memiliki pengalaman dalam mengoperasikan perangkat teknologi seperti kamera, mixer audio, dan software streaming.Memiliki pengetahuan yang baik tentang teknologi streaming dan perangkat lunak yang digunakan dalam siaran langsung.Mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan dan menjaga konsentrasi selama siaran langsung.Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi yang baik dengan host acara, tamu, dan mitra lainnya.Mampu bekerja dalam tim dan menyelesaikan tugas dengan deadline yang ketat.Jika Anda tertarik dengan posisi Operator Live Stream, kami mengundang Anda untuk melamar pekerjaan ini dan bergabung dengan tim kami.

Job Title: Regulatory Officer dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) – Alat Kesehatan
Facility: Nusa Asia menawarkan paket gaji dan insentif yang kompetitif, Kesempatan belajar dan berkembang dengan tenaga professional, Continuous Improvement adalah pedoman kami
Job Description: Nusa Asia Medika (Lokasi Green Lake City, Tangerang) membuka lowongan untuk  Regulatory Officer dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) – Medical Device (Alat Kesehatan)  Deskripsi Pekerjaan Regulatory Officer dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) : Menjadi Penanggung Jawab Teknis (PJT) perusahaan yang bergerak dalam bidang Alat Kesehatan.Mengikuti perkembangan terbaru dari rangkaian produk Perusahaan. Mendukung pengajuan pendaftaran, Izin Distribusi Alat Kesehatan (IDAK), Izin Edar Alat Kesehatan Luar Negeri, Sertifikasi dan Lisensi CDAKB, Lisensi TKDN, dan perpanjangan dengan tenggat waktu yang ketat untuk memastikan sertifikat produk sesuai dengan kode/ ruang lingkup produk.Aplikasi e-Report untuk Alkes dan distribusi Alkes oleh produsen atau Distributor Alkes.Secara proaktif melacak semua registrasi, menyimpan catatan registrasi, dan mulai aktivitas pembaruan yang tepat untuk memastikan bahwa registrasi saat ini tidak kadaluarsa dan membahayakan penjualan di Indonesia.Mengikuti perkembangan Peraturan Alat Kesehatan dan memberikan panduan kepada tim pengembangan produk terkait data dan informasi yang diperlukan untuk mempersiapkan pendaftaran tersebut.Mendukung inspeksi regulasi oleh badan Regulator/ Badan yang diberitahukan setempat jika diperlukan.Berkoordinasi dengan principals untuk menginformasikan kepada pihak berwenang di Indonesia mengenai perubahan pada produk yang didaftarkan.Melaksanakan tugas-tugas regulasi/ kualitas lainnya yang didelegasikan oleh manajer atau manajemen PT. Nusa Asia Medika.Apabila seluruh kegiatan yang berhubungan dengan Regulatory telah terselesaikan dengan baik, memberikan dukungan untuk aktifitas penjualan dan/atau pemasaran perusahaan. Termasuk di dalamnya adalah untuk membuat Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) perusahaan, memberikan pelatihan/training kepada seluruh karyawan perusahaan atas SOP ini, dan memastikan bahwa SOP berjalan dengan baik. Persyaratan:Memiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 2-3 tahun di bidang Regulatory Affairs untuk produk alat KesehatanMemiliki setidaknya gelar Sarjana Farmasi dari Universitas yang terakreditasiMemiliki kemampuan komunikasi lisan dan tulisan yang sangat baik dengan kemampuan Bahasa inggris yang baikKemampuan untuk bekerja secara mandiri dengan pengawasan minimal, mengatur, memprioritaskan, dan mengelola beberapa proyek secara efektifSikap positif, perhatian yang kuat terhadap detail, dan kemampuan untuk memecahkan masalah secara mandiriPemahaman yang komprehensif tentang kegiatan regulasi dan bagaimana dampaknya terhdap produk dan/atau proses lainnya.Pengetahuan tentang sistem manajemen mutu, kompilasi file teknis, dan persyaratan peraturan perangkat medis Indonesia.

Job Title: Digital Marketing & Social Media Specialist untuk Klinik Kecantikan
Facility: BPJS, THR, Bonus Insentive
Job Description: Deskripsi Pekerjaan:Kami mencari seorang Digital Marketing & Social Media Specialist yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim pemasaran kami di klinik kecantikan kami. Kandidat yang ideal akan memiliki pengetahuan yang luas tentang strategi pemasaran digital dan media sosial, memiliki pengalaman minimal 3-5 tahun di bidang yang sama, dan mampu meningkatkan visibilitas online klinik kecantikan kami. Kualifikasi:Memiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 3-5 tahun sebagai Digital Marketing & Social Media Specialist di industri kecantikan atau sejenisnya.Memiliki pengetahuan yang mendalam tentang strategi pemasaran digital, termasuk SEO, SEM, media sosial, dan kampanye pemasaran online lainnya.Kemampuan analisis yang baik dan dapat menghasilkan laporan yang terperinci tentang kinerja kampanye pemasaran.Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan mampu bekerja sama dengan tim.Memiliki kemampuan multitasking yang baik dan dapat bekerja dalam lingkungan yang cepat dan dinamis.Memiliki pengetahuan yang baik tentang perkembangan terbaru dalam pemasaran digital dan media sosial, serta dapat mengimplementasikannya dalam strategi pemasaran kami. Tanggung Jawab:Mengembangkan dan melaksanakan strategi pemasaran digital yang efektif untuk meningkatkan visibilitas dan penjualan klinik kecantikan kami.Mengelola kampanye pemasaran online, termasuk SEO, SEM, media sosial, dan kampanye iklan online lainnya.Membuat dan mengelola konten media sosial yang menarik dan relevan untuk meningkatkan keterlibatan pengguna.Menganalisis data pemasaran digital dan media sosial serta menghasilkan laporan yang memberikan wawasan tentang kinerja kampanye.Berkolaborasi dengan tim pemasaran dan tim lainnya untuk mengembangkan ide-ide pemasaran kreatif.Memantau tren industri dan mengidentifikasi peluang pemasaran baru untuk meningkatkan visibilitas klinik kecantikan kami.Menjaga hubungan yang baik dengan pelanggan melalui media sosial dan platform online lainnya.Mengelola anggaran pemasaran digital dan media sosial serta memastikan penggunaannya efisien. Jika Anda memenuhi kualifikasi di atas dan tertarik untuk bergabung dengan tim pemasaran kami, kirimkan CV dan surat lamaran Anda

Amman Mineral Industri has a Flash Smelting Furnace (FSF), a Flash Converting Furnace (FCF), Anode Plant and associated utilities in its Copper Smelting unit located at the Sumbawa Island in Indonesia.  The smelters convert copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines in the same island, to copper anodes of the stipulated specification for supply to the Electro Refinery in the same complex for the production of copper cathodes.  The off-gas from the FSF and FCF is supplied to the Sulphuric Acid Plant. Position to be open:Operator UtilitiesOperator PowerhouseOperator FSF/FCFetcRequirements:Diploma Engineer/ Trade certificate in  Electrical/Mechanical Engineering or related studyGPA (IPK) min 3.2 of 4.0Fluency in both written and spoken English; and computer literateWilling to locate on site at Sumbawa Barat.Hiring Process:Only shortlisted candidate will be contacted and invited to the Walk-in-InterviewWalk-in-Interview will be conducted in Jakarta (Week 4 of March 2024)

Job Description: Deskripsi PekerjaanSeorang Operator Live Stream bertanggung jawab untuk mengatur, menjalankan, dan mengawasi siaran langsung (live stream) acara atau kegiatan di platform online. Berikut adalah deskripsi pekerjaan Operator Live StreamBenefit Pekerjaan• Gaji pokok bulanan dan UM• BPJS Ketenagakerjaan• Libur 4 kali dalam satu bulan di hari Senin• Tunjangan Kinerja , Bonus Penjualan dan THR Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab :Mengatur dan mengoperasikan perangkat teknologi seperti kamera, mixer audio, dan software streaming untuk menghasilkan siaran langsung yang berkualitas tinggi.Memastikan koneksi internet stabil dan memantau jaringan untuk memastikan kualitas siaran tidak terganggu.Menyiapkan dan mengatur peralatan teknis seperti kamera, mikrofon, dan lampu untuk menjamin kualitas gambar dan suara yang optimal.Menjalin komunikasi dengan host acara dan tamu untuk memastikan informasi dan jadwal acara terpenuhi.Mengedit rekaman siaran langsung jika diperlukan dan menyimpan rekaman tersebut untuk digunakan kembali di masa depan.Menyediakan dukungan teknis selama acara berlangsung dan menangani masalah teknis yang terjadi selama siaran langsung.Menjalin hubungan baik dengan mitra dan pemangku kepentingan lainnya untuk memastikan kelancaran pelaksanaan acara.Syarat PekerjaanPendidikan minimal SMA atau setara.Memiliki pengalaman dalam mengoperasikan perangkat teknologi seperti kamera, mixer audio, dan software streaming.Memiliki pengetahuan yang baik tentang teknologi streaming dan perangkat lunak yang digunakan dalam siaran langsung.Mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan dan menjaga konsentrasi selama siaran langsung.Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi yang baik dengan host acara, tamu, dan mitra lainnya.Mampu bekerja dalam tim dan menyelesaikan tugas dengan deadline yang ketat.Jika Anda tertarik dengan posisi Operator Live Stream, kami mengundang Anda untuk melamar pekerjaan ini dan bergabung dengan tim kami.

About Us: Tiny is a unique concept dedicated to promoting a healthy lifestyle through delicious, nutritious food in a warm and welcoming environment for both adults and kids. Our restaurant features a dedicated kids' area that provides entertainment and a homely atmosphere. We believe in creating memorable experiences for our guests, and our commitment to quality extends to every aspect of our brand.Job Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and creative Marketing and Event Manager to join our team and contribute to the growth of our unique concept. The ideal candidate will be responsible for curating engaging events, managing the visual identity of our brand both online and offline, and spearheading marketing initiatives to raise awareness of our brand in the market.Responsibilities:Event Management:Conceptualize, plan, and execute events that align with our healthy food and eco-friendly values.Coordinate with relevant stakeholders to invite speakers and organize informative sessions related to our concept.Develop and implement a full-circle birthday party experience that reflects our brand ethos.Marketing:Manage the overall visual identity of the brand, ensuring consistency across all platforms.Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand awareness and reach a wider audience.Create and curate engaging content for online platforms, including social media, website, and email campaigns.Oversee the production of marketing materials, both digital and print, maintaining a cohesive and appealing brand image.Collaboration:Work closely with internal teams, including chefs and management, to ensure marketing initiatives align with the restaurant's offerings.Establish and maintain relationships with influencers, media partners, and other collaborators to enhance brand visibility.Requirements:Proven experience in event management, preferably in the hospitality industry.Strong understanding of marketing principles with hands-on experience in developing and implementing successful campaigns.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box.Familiarity with sustainable and eco-friendly practices is a plus.

We are expanding our team! Ksatria is seeking highly motivated individuals, including nurses, doctors, hospital staff, and experienced software implementors, to join us as Software Implementation Specialists. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in deploying and demonstrating our health information software, aimed at enhancing patient care across Indonesia and overseas. Responsibilities: Implement health information software to meet the specific needs of our customers' healthcare facilities. Work closely with our software development team to address technical challenges and enhance software functionality. Conduct training sessions for healthcare staff on effectively utilizing the health information software to improve patient care and workflow efficiency. Uphold data privacy regulations and ensure the confidentiality of patient information. Assess the software's impact and suggest improvements for optimal performance. Analytical Skills: Possess strong analytical abilities to evaluate complex data and workflows, identify issues, and develop solutions that enhance system performance and user experience. (Preferred) Project Management: Experience in managing projects, including planning, allocating resources, and handling risks, will be highly advantageous for successful software implementation in healthcare settings. Requirements: Degree in Medicine, Nursing, or relevant healthcare field; or significant experience in software implementation within healthcare settings. Demonstrated experience in implementing health information software in a clinical environment. Excellent English communication skills, both verbal and written. Profound understanding of data privacy laws, clinical workflows, medical terminology, and healthcare operations. Commitment to maintaining patient confidentiality is paramount. Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team. We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. A dynamic, fast-paced work environment in the healthcare sector. An opportunity to significantly impact patient care through technology. If you are passionate about leveraging technology to enhance healthcare and have a successful track record in health information software implementation, we invite you to apply for this exciting role!

About Us: Tiny is a unique concept dedicated to promoting a healthy lifestyle through delicious, nutritious food in a warm and welcoming environment for both adults and kids. Our restaurant features a dedicated kids' area that provides entertainment and a homely atmosphere. We believe in creating memorable experiences for our guests, and our commitment to quality extends to every aspect of our brand.Job Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and creative Marketing and Event Manager to join our team and contribute to the growth of our unique concept. PT Dana Purna Investama (DPI) didirikan oleh Dana Pensiun BCA  berdasarkan Akte Notaris DR. Fulgensius Jimmy nomor 123 tanggal 24 April 2007 untuk menjalankan kegiatan usaha dibidang jasa pengelola gedung, jasa pelatihan & ketrampilan tenaga kerja, dan jasa outsourcing.  Dengan sumber daya yang dimiliki, DPI berkomitmen membantu Pelanggan dalam mengelola fasilitas gedungnya dengan baik sehingga Pelanggan dapat fokus mengelola bisnis intinya.Meskipun DPI merupakan perusahaan yang relatif baru, namun dibawah manajemen yang telah berpengalaman dalam pengelolaan gedung, DPI terus berkembang dan semakin dipercaya untuk mengelola gedung milik perusahaan swasta maupun BUMN di seluruh Indonesia. Dengan dukungan finansial yang kuat dan tim pendukung yang profesional, DPI akan berusaha terus menjaga kepuasan pelanggan dan menjadi tolok ukur (Benchmarking) dalam industri pengelolaan gedung di Indonesia.

Company Name: PT APVC Indonesia ( Accor Vacation Club )
Facility: Location & Flexibility, Training & Development, Operations Leadership
Job Description: Welcome to Accor Vacation Club Asia – where we’re dedicated to providing ‘holidays of a lifetime’ for our valued Members, opening a gateway to unforgettable experiences and a vibrant lifestyle. At Accor Vacation Club Asia, we aim to foster a workplace where passion meets purpose, where every team member is valued and empowered to excel.We are seeking, a customer service leader who is dedicated to excellence to join our Member Services team operating out of Novotel Nusa Dua, Bali. As the Member Services Manager, you'll lead our Member Services team in delivering exceptional member engagement and ensuring top-notch Quality Assurance fostering a culture of outstanding service at every touch point. WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU:Epic Tropical Location: Work Your Way amidst the tropical retreat of Nusa Dua, where the blend of crystal- clear waters, lush greenery, and coastal activities are right at your doorstep!Flexible Working: Member services office open 7 days, 9am-6pm. Flexible working to suit you and team requirements. Dynamic Environment: Thrive in a dynamic and supportive environment within a renowned hospitality brand.Personalized Training: Dive into personalized training from day one and launch your career within Accor Vacation Club, paving the way for your career advancement.Professional Development: Enhance your skills in a supportive and engaging team environment. We provide professional development support to foster your growth.Global Benefits & Beyond: Unlock a world of benefits covering accommodation, dining, lifestyle perks, and more!WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:Operations Leadership: Lead the day-to-day operations of our Member Services team, ensuring seamless integration with other departments and delivering exceptional service.Team Culture: Cultivate a positive team culture and work environment that inspires excellence.Training Excellence: Provide high-quality training to equip our team with the skills needed to uphold Accor Vacation Club Asia standards and resolve Member queries or concerns effectively.Performance Improvement: Monitor team performance against quality benchmarks and drive continuous improvement initiatives.Member Satisfaction: Handle escalated Member complaints professionally and ensure timely resolution and effective service recovery.Member Onboarding: collaborate closely with the Sales department to ensure a seamless onboarding experience for all new Members.Collaboration:  Manage outbound engagement programs and collaborate with key partners to maintain data integrity, security, and compliance.Team Development: Support and develop team members through effective coaching and performance management. YOUR EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS INCLUDE: Work Experience: A minimum of one-year prior work experience in member or customer relations is preferred.Highly Developed Interpersonal Skills: Ability to coach and lead people, developing a strong team culture (essential).Language Proficiency: Proficiency in verbal and writing communication skills in Bahasa and English.Target-Oriented Mindset: Track record of working towards and achieving targets and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).Engagement and Work Ethic: Engaging team member with a strong work ethic, flexible approach, and supportive of others (essential).Organizational Skills: Ability to self-organize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.  If you're passionate about hospitality and dedicated to delivering exceptional member experiences, we invite you to join us at Accor Vacation Club Asia. Apply now and embark on an exciting journey with us!Accor Vacation Club is committed to fostering a diverse & inclusive culture. We believe in equal opportunities and are dedicated to creating a workplace where individuals are valued, supported, and celebrates the unique talents and perspectives that each person brings to our teamPlease send your application TODAY to :[email protected]

Maintenance Engineer (Bahasa)
Tanggung Jawab Pekerjaan:
• Menanggapi dan menghadiri permintaan perbaikan tamu.
• Berkomunikasi dengan tamu/pelanggan untuk menyelesaikan masalah pemeliharaan.
• Melakukan perawatan preventif pada perkakas dan peralatan dapur dan ruang mekanik, termasuk pembersihan dan pelumasan.
• Periksa perkakas, peralatan, atau mesin secara visual.
• Membawa peralatan (misalnya, peralatan, radio).
• Lakukan semua persiapan permukaan, pengecatan, perbaikan drywall kecil dan trim kayu, penggantian bola lampu dan filter A/C serta pembersihan menyeluruh pada area pengecatan atau perbaikan.
• Menguji, memecahkan masalah, dan melakukan perbaikan dasar pada semua jenis peralatan, pipa ledeng (mis., cop penyedot toilet dan saluran pembuangan yang tersumbat), komponen listrik termasuk lampu, barang kosmetik, kabel ekstensi, penyedot debu, perangkat internet, mengganti sakelar dan stopkontak listrik, dan lainnya barang-barang kamar tamu.
• Menampilkan keterampilan komputer dasar termasuk memasukkan jadwal air handler dan membuat perubahan suhu.
Persyaratan Pekerjaan:
• Kemampuan untuk berkomunikasi dengan jelas dan efisien dalam bahasa Inggris, baik lisan maupun tulisan
• Pengalaman terkini dalam bidang teknik dan fasilitas atau peran serupa·
• Mampu bekerja dalam tim ·
• Kemampuan untuk melakukan banyak tugas dan tetap tenang di bawah tekanan·
• Ikuti semua kebijakan dan prosedur perusahaan dan keselamatan dan keamanan
• laporkan masalah pemeliharaan, bahaya keselamatan, kecelakaan, atau cedera
• pelatihan dan sertifikasi keselamatan lengkap
• Memindahkan, mengangkat, membawa, mendorong, menarik, dan menempatkan benda yang beratnya kurang dari atau sama dengan 23kg  tanpa bantuan dan tugas mengangkat atau gerakan yang lebih berat dengan bantuan.
• Naik dan turun tangga, landai servis, dan/atau tangga lipat.
• Menjangkau objek di atas kepala dan di bawah lutut, termasuk menekuk, memutar, menarik, dan membungkuk
Persyaratan minimum:
Tersedia jam fleksibel
Tidak diperlukan pengalaman kerja untuk posisi ini

Job Title: Smelter - Electrical Position (Walk in interview - Surabaya)
Job Description: Amman Mineral Industri at Sumbawa Island in Indonesia has a Smelter complex including the Smelters, Electro Refinery (ER), Sulphuric Acid Plant (SAP), Precious Metal Refinery (PMR), Copper concentrate, received from the Batu Hijau mines, is converted through a process of smelting and electro refining to copper cathodes of specified purity for shipment to customers in Indonesia as well as other parts of the world. Sulphur dioxide produced during operations is converted to sulphuric acid and precious metals such as gold, silver and selenium are produced as by products for sale to customers. The operations require a Raw Material Handling Plant (MHP) for receiving, storing and blending the copper concentrate and Utilities to support operations. Position to be open:Sr. Spv. ElectricalSupt. Bisa berkomunikasi dengan bahasa inggris.

Kesempatan untuk bekerja di industri seni dan kerajinan tangan yang dinamis di Bali. Lingkungan kerja yang kreatif dan mendukung.

Facility: Dynamic Environment: Work culture that values creativity and innovation., Career growth in an environment that encourages continuous learning., Creative Freedom: Enjoy the freedom to explore and express your creative vision.
Job Description: Job Description:We are seeking a talented and experienced Art Director to join our creative team at Prabu Indonesia. The ideal candidate will be a visionary leader with a passion for visual storytelling and a proven track record of translating creative concepts into compelling visual experiences. As an Art Director, you will be responsible for overseeing the artistic direction and visual identity of our projects, ensuring they align with the company's brand and objectives. Responsibilities:Creative Direction:Develop and communicate a strong creative vision for various projects, campaigns, and initiatives.Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, design, and content, to ensure cohesive and impactful visual storytelling.Design Leadership:Lead and inspire a team of designers, providing guidance and mentorship to foster a collaborative and innovative work environment.Set high standards for design quality, ensuring that all creative output meets or exceeds brand expectations.Brand Consistency:Ensure the consistent application of the company's brand guidelines across all visual elements.Work closely with marketing teams to align creative concepts with overall brand strategy.Project Management:Manage multiple projects simultaneously, adhering to deadlines and budgets.Collaborate with project managers to ensure efficient workflows and timely delivery of creative assets.Stay Current with Industry Trends:Keep abreast of industry trends, design tools, and emerging technologies to bring fresh ideas and innovation to the team. Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Fine Arts, Graphic Design, or a related field.Proven experience as an Art Director or in a similar creative leadership role.Strong portfolio showcasing a variety of creative projects and a keen eye for design aesthetics.Excellent communication and presentation skills.Proficient in industry-standard design software and tools.Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. If you are a passionate and visionary Art Director with a strong commitment to excellence, we invite you to join our dynamic team at Prabu Indonesia. Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and creative approach.
