Advanced degrees or certifications are a plus.Experience:Proven experience as a Project Manager with a focus on KOL management or influencer marketing.Demonstrated success in developing and executing KOL strategies.Industry Knowledge:In-depth understanding of social media, influencer marketing trends, and the evolving landscape of Key Opinion Leaders.Familiarity with various industries and the ability to identify relevant KOLs.Communication Skills:Excellent communication and negotiation skills.Ability to effectively convey project goals and expectations to KOLs and internal teams.Good English in verbal and written (preferred)Organizational Skills:Strong organizational and time management skills.Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple KOL relationships and campaigns simultaneously.Adaptability:Ability to adapt to changing trends and evolving industry landscapes.Flexibility to adjust strategies based on campaign performance and feedback.Analytical Skills:Strong analytical skills to interpret campaign data and make data-driven decisions.Proficiency in using analytics tools to measure and report on KOL performance.Tech Savvy:Familiarity with social media platforms, content creation tools, and influencer marketing platforms.Ability to leverage technology to streamline KOL management processes.

Facility: 2-4 yrs experience in QC inspection, Toy & children products, electronics/electrical products, Frequent travel in Hong Kong, Mainland and SEA region
Job Description: Who we are:WHY Brands Inc., a parent company of Munchkin and Curio Home Goods, focuses on creating, incubating, and growing the next generation of consumer lifestyle brands. Founded in 1990, Munchkin is the leading consumer product company and most loved baby lifestyle brand behind the innovative gear and products for children, mothers, and caregivers. Munchkin has sold billions of dollars of products through our key retail partners: Target, Walmart, and Amazon and has global distribution in over 50 countries. Curio, a premium brand of curated collections of home goods, launched in 2023. WHY’s vision is to establish an expanding portfolio of innovative businesses that align with its commitment to inventive product design. With over 320+ patents under our belt, we continue to create solutions that leave our customers asking, "how did I ever live without this?" Recognized as #8 on America’s Most Innovative Companies list by Fortune Magazine, innovation is the core of our company DNA and has been driving our designs for 30 years!We lead with our core values and believe that investing in the community is our responsibility.  We create opportunities for every child’s potential and well-being through the Radiant Colors program, work to create a sustainable future, and in partnership with the International Fund for Animal Welfare have committed to animal conservation. There is no better time than now to join WHY Brands as we embark on our next and biggest growth journey, and you could be the next influential leader to play a key role in driving enormous customer-centered value and rapid growth.    Position Summary: The Quality Control Inspector is responsible for conducting quality control inspections/ verifications/ assessment, quality control metrics, production monitoring, and testing on manufacturing supplies, in-process materials, and finished products. This also includes the checking of information and products and shipping marks, etc.  The Quality Control Inspector shall comply with all standards, regulations, and requirements to monitor safety and quality activities in Indonesia and other locations internationally when required. This position will be employed through a designated Employer of Record. You’ll Do:Perform quality control inspections, checking, assessment and tests during the entire manufacturing process including in-process materials, components and finished products.Record observations during the production process and recommend improvements to the production process to ensure quality control.Responsible for Inspection of materials, parts and final products at different stages of production.Document the inspections results by completing reports.  Recommend new inspection procedures and methods for quality inspection improvement process.Support the quality function by giving constructive feedback on quality/engineering issues.Identify the causes of product defects/ reworks and provide corrective action feedback to suppliers and manufacturers, Other duties may be assigned.Bring it!Minimum two to four years of quality control inspection or quality control experience.Knowledge of applicable regulations, standards, and laws including ISO 9001:2008, FDA, UL, EN71, EU, CSA ASTM-F963, and global regulatory for consumer products, etc.Knowledge of continuous process improvement or related discipline.Excellent numerical skills and statistics is a plus. Ability to use computer software, including Word, Excel, MS Work, MS Access, MS Outlook, and MRP systems.Knowledge of production process (e.g. sewing, injection, assembly and final packing) and quality control.Strong understanding of quality control standards, process and testing techniques on electrical products (e.g. bottle warmer, sterilizer).Must be experienced and have effective communication skills in working with Hong Kong or China-based engineers and quality personnel.Local dialect and able to speak/ read and write English are a must; knowledge in Cantonese/Mandarin a plus.Frequently visits to Indonesia factories, and travel to other international locations occasionally as required, to monitor safety & quality activities.If you are interested in joining our team, please visit www.munchkin.com for more information and submit your online application through https://www.munchkin.com/join.Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only.

Job SummaryResponsible for the full spectrum of account receivable activities; Responsible for all aspects of fixed asset accounting; Support on Indonesia companies’ daily process operations and entry posting. This position will report to Finance Supervisor.Responsibilities: Account Receivable (AR):Issue tax invoices and perform 3-way matching of sales contract/order, goods delivery note and tax invoices;Post accounting entries of revenue and AR transactions onto ERP system timely and correctly;Post accouting entries of AR collection and clearance onto ERP system timely and correctly;Bind and archive copies of sales contract/order, goods delivery note, tax invoices and cash collection bankslips properly and timely as JE supportings;Prepare monthly AR aging report to monitor outstanding payments and follow up with customers for timely collection;Prepare monthly intercompany transaction list and perform reconciliation with group companies;Perform monthly VAT output reconciliation with ERP accounting record. 2. Fixed Assets (FA):Extract CIP list from ERP system, circulate the list to respective departments to confirm receipt status and start-to-use date;Post accounting entries of transferring CIP to FA transactions onto ERP system and issue unique asset tag to each new added FA;Maintain FA record in ERP system and posting monthly depreciation accounting entries based on system‘s calculation;Post accounting entries of FA disposals (if any);Maintain Right-of-use asset record in ERP system and post lease accounting entries according to lease schedule reviewed by finance controlling team;Coordinate on intra-group FA transfer and prepare FA related information in monthly intercompany transaction list;Conduct regular physical checks of fixed assets and ensure proper tagging with unique asset codes. 3. Other support on process operation and entry posting:Assist in collecting reimbursement invoices and check reimbursement application form;Responsible for binding and filing of Journal entries and supporting documents (original copies of invoices, PO, DO, bank statements, etc.);Assist the supervisor in the monthly account closing activities;Assist in conducting monthly and annual stocktake;Assist in external audits and tax filing process, with directions from finance supervisor;Other ad-hoc activities assigned by the finance supervisor. Qualifications:Diploma or Bachelor Degree in Accounting or equivalentPreferably at least 5 years working experience in finance and accounting functionPrior experience in trading and manufacturing is highly preferredERP experience is a plusAbility to communicate effectively in English (spoken and written) Willing to work in Cikarang

About Us: Mama Pizza is a renowned and thriving restaurant known for sourdough Pizza. With a commitment to culinary excellence and exceptional guest experiences, we have established ourselves as a leader in the hospitality industry. As we continue to expand our operations, we are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Restaurant Accountant to join our team.Job Description: As the Senior Restaurant Accountant at Mama Pizza, you will oversee all aspects of our financial operations and ensure the accuracy and integrity of our financial reporting. You will be responsible for:Managing the day-to-day accounting functions, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, and general ledger.Ensuring compliance with all accounting standards, tax regulations, and internal controls.Preparing monthly financial statements, including profit and loss statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements.Analyzing financial data and providing insights to support strategic decision-making and operational improvements.Developing and implementing accounting policies, procedures, and controls to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.Leading the annual budgeting process and providing ongoing variance analysis and financial performance reporting.Collaborating with external auditors and tax advisors to facilitate audits and tax filings.Mentoring and supervising junior accounting staff, providing guidance and support as needed.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field; CPA (Certified Public Accountant) certification preferred. years of progressive experience in accounting roles, preferably in the restaurant or hospitality industry.Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP, Oracle) and Microsoft Excel.Strong understanding of GAAP (Generally Accepted Accounting Principles) and financial reporting standards.Excellent analytical skills with a proven ability to interpret financial data and provide strategic insights.Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize and multitask effectively.Strong leadership and communication skills, with a collaborative and team-oriented approach.Knowledge of restaurant-specific accounting practices and software (e.g., Aloha, Micros) is a plus.Benefits:Competitive salary package commensurate with experience.Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off.Opportunities for professional development and career advancement within a dynamic and growing company.A supportive and inclusive work environment with a focus on employee well-being and work-life balance.Discounts on dining and other perks for employees.

PT Dana Purna Investama (DPI) didirikan oleh Dana Pensiun BCA  berdasarkan Akte Notaris DR. Fulgensius Jimmy nomor 123 tanggal 24 April 2007 untuk menjalankan kegiatan usaha dibidang jasa pengelola gedung, jasa pelatihan & ketrampilan tenaga kerja, dan jasa outsourcing.  Dengan sumber daya yang dimiliki, DPI berkomitmen membantu Pelanggan dalam mengelola fasilitas gedungnya dengan baik sehingga Pelanggan dapat fokus mengelola bisnis intinya.Meskipun DPI merupakan perusahaan yang relatif baru, namun dibawah manajemen yang telah berpengalaman dalam pengelolaan gedung, DPI terus berkembang dan semakin dipercaya untuk mengelola gedung milik perusahaan swasta maupun BUMN di seluruh Indonesia. Dengan dukungan finansial yang kuat dan tim pendukung yang profesional, DPI akan berusaha terus menjaga kepuasan pelanggan dan menjadi tolok ukur (Benchmarking) dalam industri pengelolaan gedung di Indonesia.

Job brief
We are looking for a competitive and
trustworthy IT Sales Executive to help us build up our
business activities.
Sales Executive responsibilities
include discovering and pursuing new sales prospects, negotiating deals and maintaining
customer satisfaction. If you have excellent communication skills and feel
comfortable reaching out to potential customers to demonstrate our services and
products through email and phone, we’d like to meet you.
Responsibilities
As an IT sales professional, you'll
need to:
·        
Speak to customers, either face to face or over the phone
·        
Gain an understanding of customers' specific business needs and apply
product knowledge to meet them
·        
Carry out cold-calling in order to create interest in products and services,
generate new business leads and arrange meetings
·        
Identify and develop new business through networking and follow-up
courtesy calls
·        
Prepare and deliver presentations and demonstrations of software to
customers
·        
Market and promote a portfolio of products by writing and designing sales
literature and attending industry events
·        
Provide technical advice to customers on all aspects of the installation
and use of computer systems and networks, both before and after the sale
·        
Meet sales targets set by managers and contribute to team targets
·        
Accommodate all forms of complaints from customers and seek solutions
both internally and externally to achieve company goals.
·        
Regularly report on sales results.
·        
Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve company objectives
Requirements and skills
·        
Bachelor's Degree in any major, preferably Communication/ Management
/Computer Science/Information Technology (GPA minimal 2.8)

Max. 35 years old.
Proven experience as a Sales Executive or relevant
 role at least 2 years working experience
Proficiency in English
Thorough understanding of marketing and
 negotiating techniques
Aptitude in delivering attractive presentations

Will be work at BSD, Tangerang

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Live Streaming Producer to join our dynamic team. The Live Streaming Producer will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and executing live streaming events, broadcasts, and productions for TikTok & Shopee live platforms. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent organizational skills, and a passion for delivering high-quality live content to audiences worldwide.Responsibilities:Collaborate with content creators, hosts, and production team members to develop concepts and strategies for Tiktok & Shopee live streaming events and broadcasts.Plan and schedule Tiktok & Shopee live streaming productions, including selecting appropriate platforms, equipment, and technical resources.Coordinate pre-production activities, such as scripting, storyboarding, and rehearsal sessions, to ensure smooth execution of Tiktok & Shopee live broadcasts.Manage all technical aspects of live streaming productions, including camera setup, audio mixing, lighting, and video switching.Monitor Tiktok & Shopee live streams in real-time, troubleshooting technical issues, adjusting audio and video levels, and ensuring optimal stream quality.Coordinate with external vendors and service providers, such as streaming platforms, video hosting services, and internet service providers.Ensure compliance with copyright laws, privacy regulations, and platform policies during live broadcasts, obtaining necessary permissions and licenses as needed.Capture and archive live streaming content for future distribution, editing, or repurposing.Stay informed about emerging trends, technologies, and best practices in live streaming and online video production.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Broadcasting, Media Production, Communications, or a related field.Proven experience as a Live Streaming Producer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful live streaming productions.Proficiency with live streaming software and platforms, such as OBS Studio, Wirecast, Vimeo Livestream, YouTube Live, or Twitch.Familiarity with video production equipment, including cameras, audio mixers, lighting kits, and streaming hardware.Strong technical skills, with the ability to troubleshoot hardware and software issues quickly and effectively.Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize tasks in a fast-paced environment.Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and external partners.Creativity, attention to detail, and a passion for delivering engaging and immersive live content to Tiktok & Shopee live audiences .

PT Dana Purna Investama (DPI) didirikan oleh Dana Pensiun BCA  berdasarkan Akte Notaris DR. Fulgensius Jimmy nomor 123 tanggal 24 April 2007 untuk menjalankan kegiatan usaha dibidang jasa pengelola gedung, jasa pelatihan & ketrampilan tenaga kerja, dan jasa outsourcing.  Dengan sumber daya yang dimiliki, DPI berkomitmen membantu Pelanggan dalam mengelola fasilitas gedungnya dengan baik sehingga Pelanggan dapat fokus mengelola bisnis intinya.Meskipun DPI merupakan perusahaan yang relatif baru, namun dibawah manajemen yang telah berpengalaman dalam pengelolaan gedung, DPI terus berkembang dan semakin dipercaya untuk mengelola gedung milik perusahaan swasta maupun BUMN di seluruh Indonesia. Dengan dukungan finansial yang kuat dan tim pendukung yang profesional, DPI akan berusaha terus menjaga kepuasan pelanggan dan menjadi tolok ukur (Benchmarking) dalam industri pengelolaan gedung di Indonesia.

Membantu menjaga keamanan di toko
Melaporkan stok yang kurang atau perlu diisi

Kemampuan bekerja sama dalam tim toko
Berorientasi pada kepuasan pelanggan

Tugas customer service pada dasarnya adalah menjadi jembatan antara pelanggan dan perusahaan. CS adalah citra bagi perusahaan tempatnya bekerja. Itu sebabnya CS wajib untuk menjaga nama baik perusahaan. Berikut tugas seorang CS.1. Membangun hubungan yang baik dengan pelangganSeorang customer service harus bisa membangun hubungan yang baik dengan pelanggan perusahaan tempatnya bekerja. Caranya dengan memberikan pelayanan yang ramah dan maksimal.
CS harus bisa memberikan kesan positif, karena itu akan menjadi cerminan perusahaan tersebut di mata pelanggan. CS harus bisa memberikan informasi yang dibutuhkan oleh konsumen.2. Melakukan penanganan terhadap keluhan-keluhan yang disampaikan konsumenSelain memberikan informasi, CS juga bertugas membantu pelanggan yang mengalami kendala yang berhubungan dengan produk atau jasa perusahan tersebut. 
Customer service harus mampu mencarikan solusi terbaik bagi kendala yang dialami pelanggan. Hal ini penting demi membangun hubungan kepercayaan yang berkelanjutan. Biar pelanggan balik lagi.3. Memahami produk/jasa yang ditawarkan perusahaanCustomer Service wajib memiliki product knowledge yang luas. Seorang CS harus menguasai segala seluk-beluk produk atau jasa yang perusahaannya tawarkan kepada pelanggan.
Hal ini akan membantu CS untuk menyampaikan informasi kepada pelanggan, sekaligus memecahkan masalah yang dialami oleh costumer.4. Menjual produk atau jasaTak hanya menjawab pertanyaan dan menyelesaikan keluhan pelanggan, di beberapa perusahaan CS juga bertugas menjual produk atau jasa yang ditawarkan.
Customer Service bisa memanfaatkan momen yang baik ketika sudah menjawab pertanyaan atau keluhan pelanggan dengan menawarkan pilihan produk atau jasa lain.5. Mengurus administrasiSelain berhubungan dengan pelanggan, CS juga harus mengurusi tugas administrasi. Etika menjawab pertanyaan atau komplain dari pelanggan CS akan mencatatnya.
CS juga harus mengurusi berbagai kelengkapan data yang dibutuhkan seperti formulir dan dokumen lainnya yang diperlukan oleh pelanggan.Skill yang Harus Dimiliki Customer Service1. Berbahasa yang baikKemampuan berbahasa yang baik adalah skill utama seorang customer service. Ketika menjawab pertanyaan pelanggan, CS harus bisa menggunakan bahasa yang positif.
Hal yang sama juga harus dilakukan ketika CS harus memberi informasi yang bakal mengecewakan atau tidak sesuai ekspektasi pelanggan. Kemampuan berbahasa ini sangat penting dimiliki CS.2. Problem solvingSkill selanjutnya yang wajib dimiliki oleh seorang CS adalah problem solving alias kemampuan menyelesaikan masalah. Seorang CS harus bisa memberikan solusi yang tepat dan cepat kepada pelanggan yang melakukan komplain.
CS harus bisa memberikan solusi terbaik yang menguntungkan pelanggan sekaligus perusahaan. Pelanggan yang merasa terbantu akan merasa puas dan tidak jarang kembali lagi untuk membeli atau menggunakan produk yang ditawarkan perusahaan.3. EmpatiEmpati menjadi skill yang harus dimiliki seorang CS. Seorang CS yang baik benar-benar memahami dan mau membantu menyelesaikan masalah customer. CS harus bisa jadi pendengar yang baik.
Jangan sampai malah ogah-ogahan ketika dimintai tolong oleh pelanggan yang sedang menyampaikan keluhannya. Tanpa diminta pun, CS yang baik akan menawarkan solusi untuk pelanggannya.4. Tekun dan TelitiKetika menyampaikan informasi dan menerima keluhan dari konsumen, seorang CS harus memasukkan data konsumen dan melakukan cross check alias pemeriksaan ulang. Di sini pentingnya ketekunan dan ketelitian.
Jangan sampai CS salah memasukkan data pelanggan yang ujung-ujungnya bisa merugikan pelanggan dan perusahaan sekaligus.5. SabarYa, seorang CS harus bisa menjadi pribadi yang sabar saat menerima segudang pertanyaan dan komplain dari pelanggan. Jangan sampai CS terbawa perasaan dan ikutan kesal.
Seorang customer service memang harus kuat mental dan memiliki kesabaran, tidak peduli seberapa banyaknya pertanyaan dan komplain dari customer.

Jika Anda adalah orang yang penuh dedikasi, memiliki ketelitian kerja tinggi, dan memiliki kemampuan analisis yang luar biasa, maka inilah kesempatan Anda untuk sukses Bersama kami! Apa yang akan Anda lakukan:Tanggung Jawab Utama:• Mengelola konten produk; mulai dari judul, foto/video produk, hingga deskripsi yang menarik calon pelanggan – memastikan relevansi konten (dinamis menyesuaikan kondisi produk dan pasar),• Mengatur harga jual produk berdasarkan kondisi pasar – mengikuti kesesuaian harga pasar yang dinamis,• Berkolaborasi dengan tim pemasaran untuk mengembangkan strategi konten yang efektif,• Menganalisa performa konten hingga ke tingkat penjualan untuk mengidentifikasi peluang dan perbaikan,• Membuat laporan dan merekomendasikan perbaikan berdasarkan hasil analisis.Inovasi dan Kreativitas:• Berkontribusi dalam ide-ide kreatif untuk meningkatkan keberhasilan kampanye pemasaran,• Memastikan konsistensi brand dalam semua materi pemasaran, termasuk kegiatan di luar pengelolaan konten sebagai upaya meningkatkan sales.Apa yang kami tawarkan:Penghasilan Tinggi:• Dapatkan penghargaan yang sepadan dengan pencapaian Anda. Komisi dan   Bonus menarik menanti bagi yang berhasil mencapai target penjualan.  Pengembangan Karier:• Kesempatan untuk tumbuh dan berkembang bersama perusahaan yang        berorientasi pada prestasi,• Pelatihan dan dukungan untuk meningkatkan keterampilan Anda.  Lingkungan Kerja Yang Dinamis:• Bergabung dengan tim yang kolaboratif dan penuh semangat,• Dukungan tim yang solid untuk membantu Anda mencapai keberhasilan   bersama.Kesehatan Mental Yang Diperhatikan: Kami sangat menghargai kerja keras tim kami dan kami memahami pentingnya kesehatan mental dalam produktivitas dan kebahagiaan kerja. Kami menyediakan lingkungan kerja yang mendukung dengan program kesejahteraan yang dirancang untuk menjaga keseimbangan antara pekerjaan dan kehidupan pribadi.Keunggulan Bekerja di Perusahaan Kami:• Insurance (untuk tim yang sudah melewati masa probation)• Waktu Cuti• Waktu libur pada hari Minggu/Tanggal Merah• Compliment Snack TimePersyaratan Pekerjaan:• Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun dalam manajemen konten marketplace atau bidang terkait• Memiliki etika dan integritas• Pemahaman mendalam tentang industri kesehatan dan kecantikan,• Kreatif dan inovatif dalam menyusun konten yang menarik,• Kemampuan menganalisa yang baik untuk memahami tren dan memperbaiki performa konten,• Mampu bekerja dalam tekanan serta memiliki self-management yang terarah,• Independen, mampu memutuskan tindakan, dan memiliki problem-solving skill, serta• Komunikatif dan dapat bekerja dalam tim.Bergabunglah dengan kami dan raih keberhasilan karier! Tentang Kami:PT. LAC Indah Perkasa adalah distributor produk (wholesale & retail) di bidang kesehatan dan kecantikan. Kami memasok produk-produk untuk meningkatkan kesejahteraan dan kepercayaan diri pelanggan kami. Sebagai perusahaan yang berbasis online, kami berkomitmen untuk memberikan pengalaman belanja yang istimewa kepada para pelanggan secara berkelanjutan. Serta menjadi pionir dalam membangun inovasi manajemen retail sambil terus memperluas jangkauan kami dengan pertumbuhan cabang di beberapa titik di Indonesia.

Job Description: Hi Good People!Our client, a Japanese Trading company located in South Jakarta, is currently looking for candidates to fulfill the Import Staff position, with the following details: [Position]Import Staff[Requirements]Bachelor's degree or above (Bachelor's degree or equivalent).At least 3 years of professional work experience.At least 1 year of experience in trade-related administrative tasks.Knowledge of customs clearance procedures.Business-level English proficiency (email communication).[Job Details]Importing goods purchased from Japan, China, Vietnam, and other countries into Indonesia is the main task. Each task is conducted through the following process:Compliance with import regulations, investigation of Indonesian laws, and acquisition of import licenses (e.g., PI, SNI, PB, LS, etc.).Import operations: a. Preparation of overseas data (updating shipping documents and customs clearance confirmation data). b. Arrangement of container shipment from the exporting side (quoting, arrangement, coordination). c. Import customs clearance and delivery to the distribution center (confirmation of declaration documents, drayage arrangement, coordination). d. Internal accounting office procedures (cost calculation, confirmation of customs clearance date and product price, coordination with the accounting department for payment).Communication with Japanese headquarters, local Japanese employees, business partners, and local employees will primarily be conducted in English.

Calling for all research analysts in Indonesia! Entry Level Research Analysts (Market Research) About usCorrosaLab is a growing digital consulting service agency in the field of marketing and sustainability. We have global footprints across Europe, US, and Asia. We help our clients with two main services: market research, digital business, and sustainability consulting. Our mission is to provide insights to business owners and stakeholders to make informed decisions and operate sustainably. Location: Remote (Indonesia) We are looking for a talented research analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate should have experience in conducting deep, extensive market research on specific topics. The candidate must be able to communicate effectively and fluently in business English, and fluency in Bahasa Indonesia is an added advantage. Responsibilities:Conduct deep secondary/desktop research using various sources to gather data on specific topics.Collect and organize data using Excel spreadsheets.Analyze data and present insights and recommendations in PowerPoint or Word documents.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and news (e.g., tech, sustainability, retail, finance)Participate in strategy discussions to develop research objectives and methodology.Meet project deadlines. Requirements:Proven experience in market research, with a portfolio of past research work.Excellent research skills, including the ability to conduct deep secondary research and gather data using various sources.Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis.Ability to present complex data and insights in a clear and concise manner.Excellent communication skills in business English, both written and verbal.Proficiency in Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.Comfortable working remotely and collaboratively within a team.Communicate and collaborate with the latest digital tools (e.g., Slack, Google Suite, Notion, etc.) Types of clients:We provide our services to various organizations such as Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs), startups, business owners, and large companies (multi-nationals) in the commercial sector industry. Our clients consist of local and global companies worldwide EU, US, MENA, and APAC with multiple timezones. If you're a talented research analyst with a track record of conducting deep, extensive market research on specific topics, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, portfolio of past research work, and a cover letter explaining why you would be a good fit for this role. Send your documents to: [email protected]

The Technical Manager will also be in charge of providing technical support during the proposal stage.Client DetailsThe client is a leading industrial printing company.DescriptionTechnical Support to Channel Partners:Provide effective technical assistance to channel partners, addressing inquiries, troubleshooting issues, and resolving challenges they encounter during the installation, operation, and maintenance of our industrial printing solutions.Serve as the primary point of contact for channel partners, offering expertise and guidance to ensure the successful implementation and utilization of our products.Conduct on-site visits, remote consultations, and training sessions to support channel partnersProject Proposal Solutions:Collaborate with the sales and engineering teams to review project proposals and provide technical input to develop customized solutions that meet customer requirements and project objectives.Analyze project specifications, technical drawings, and customer needs to propose innovative printing solutions, including equipment configurations, software integrations, and workflow optimizations.Prepare technical documentation, including project plans, specifications, and feasibility studies, to support the sales process and facilitate project implementation.Product and Industry Knowledge:Maintain a deep understanding of the industrial printing products, capabilities, and applications, staying abreast of industry trends, technological advancements, and competitive offerings.Conduct market research and customer analysis to identify emerging trends, evolving customer needs, and new business opportunities.Leverage your product and industry expertise to provide strategic insights, technical recommendations, and competitive positioning to drive product development initiatives and enhance customer satisfaction.Training and Development:Develop and deliver training programs, workshops, and technical seminars to educate channel partners on our products, technologies, and best practices.Create training materials, manuals, and technical documentation to support ongoing learning and development initiatives for channel partners and internal stakeholders.Evaluate training effectiveness, gather feedback, and continuously improve training programs to ensure they align with the evolving needs of our channel partners and customers.ProfileBachelor's degree in Engineering,.Proven experience in a technical role within the industrial printing industry, with a focus on providing technical support, solving complex issues, and training channel partners.Strong project management skills, with the ability to effectively manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks in a fast-paced environment.Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a track record of identifying root causes, developing innovative solutions, and implementing effective resolutions.In-depth knowledge of industrial printing products, processes, and technologies, with the ability to translate technical concepts into practical solutions for customers.Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with channel partners, customers, and internal stakeholders.Willingness to travel to customer sites and attend industry events as needed.Job OfferWork in an international and diverse settingAttractive remuneration packageCareer growth and opportunitiesTo apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. PT Dana Purna Investama (DPI) didirikan oleh Dana Pensiun BCA  berdasarkan Akte Notaris DR. Fulgensius Jimmy nomor 123 tanggal 24 April 2007 untuk menjalankan kegiatan usaha dibidang jasa pengelola gedung, jasa pelatihan & ketrampilan tenaga kerja, dan jasa outsourcing.  Dengan sumber daya yang dimiliki, DPI berkomitmen membantu Pelanggan dalam mengelola fasilitas gedungnya dengan baik sehingga Pelanggan dapat fokus mengelola bisnis intinya.Meskipun DPI merupakan perusahaan yang relatif baru, namun dibawah manajemen yang telah berpengalaman dalam pengelolaan gedung, DPI terus berkembang dan semakin dipercaya untuk mengelola gedung milik perusahaan swasta maupun BUMN di seluruh Indonesia. Dengan dukungan finansial yang kuat dan tim pendukung yang profesional, DPI akan berusaha terus menjaga kepuasan pelanggan dan menjadi tolok ukur (Benchmarking) dalam industri pengelolaan gedung di Indonesia.

Job Description: IT MANAGER1. TUJUAN / PURPOSEa. Untuk mengelola pekerjaan Teknologi Informasi (TI) dalam operasional sehari-hari dalam lingkungan perusahaanb. Memberikan solusi dan konsultasi teknologi untuk mencapai tujuan dan strategi bisnis perusahaanc. Pengawasan dan perawatan Teknologi Informasi.2. DIMENSI / DIMENSIONa. Bertanggung jawab langsung pada Direktur.b. Bekerja sama dengan pimpinan bisnis unit lain dalam memberikan konsultasi, rekomendasi tentang rencana kerja yang akan datang dan pengembangan sumber daya teknologi seperti hardware, infrastruktur, telekomunikasi, dan lainnya.3. TUGAS DAN TANGGUNG JAWAB / DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES a. Mengelola Teknologi Informasi dan sistem komputeri. Bertanggung jawab pada kesiapan dan ketersediaan sistem komputer / aplikasi dalam lingkungan perusahaanii. Membuat dan/atau implementasi semua sistem dan aplikasiiii. Merancang, mengelola dan mengawasi serta mengevaluasi operasional dari sistem informasi (software dan aplikasi) dan pendukungnya (hardware, infrastruktur, telekomunikasi)iv. Membuat dan mengimplementasikan kebijakan dan prosedur TI (IT policy) termasuk kebijakan keamanan TI (IT security policy)v. Berkerja sama dengan TI vendor untuk merancang , membuat dan meng-implementasikan sistem atau aplikasi jika diperlukanvi. Membuat dan mengawasi anggaran TI (budget) dan expendituresb. Memberikan solusi Teknologi Informasii. Bertanggung jawab pada penyediaan layanan infrastruktur termasuk aplikasi, jaringan komputer (LAN / WAN), keamanan Teknologi Informasi dan telekomunikasiii. Memberikan rekomendasi tentang solusi sistem informasi dan pendukungnyaiii. Memberikan orientasi kepada pegawai baru mengenai aplikasi atau sistem yang digunakan saat ini dan rencana atau strategi TI secara umum iv. Merancang dan membuat TI DRP (Disaster Recovery Plan)v. Memberikan arahan pada bawahan mengenai penggunaan dan solusi teknologic. Pengawasan dan perawatan Teknologi Informasii. Bekerja sama dengan senior manajemen untuk membuat, merancang pelayanan TI dalam dokumen Service Level Agreementsii. Memberikan laporan bulanan kepada Direktur Keuangan mengenai semua aspek dari departemen TI (Teknologi Informasi)4. FAKTOR KEBERHASILAN / KEY SUCCESS FACTOR Seorang IT manager dianggap berhasil dalam pelaksanaan tugasnya, dengan memiliki keahlian dan pengetahuan sebagai berikut;A. Pengetahuana. Berpengalaman dalam perancangan dan pengembangan infrastruktur TI b. Memiliki pengetahuan dalam mengelola departemen TI (managing the IT Department)c. Memiliki pengetahuan tentang Project Management ProcessB. Keahliana. Mempunyai keahlian kepemimpinan yang kuat (management dan supervisory skill)b. Mengetahui secara umum instalasi dan administrasi hardware, software dan jaringanc. Mempunyai kemampuan bekerja secara tim (team work)d. Mempunyai kemampuan analisa dan penyelesaian masalahe. Mempunyai kemampuan dalam pembuatan keputusan (decision making) f. Kemampuan berkomunikasi secara verbal maupun tulisanC. Personala. Kemampuan dalam melaksanakan tugas dalam tekanan kerja yang tinggi b. Jujur dan dapat dipercayac. Fleksibel terhadap kondisi dan lingkungan kerjad. Memiliki kepedulian dan sensitif terhadap kebutuhan bisnis5.HUBUNGAN KERJA / WORKING RELATIONSHIPA. Internala. Bekerja sama dengan pimpinan bisnis unit lain dalam perancangan, rekomendasi dan konsultasi terhadap solusi teknologib. Bekerja sama dengan senior manajemen dalam perencanaan strategi TI untuk mendukung keberhasilan tujuan perusahaanc. Bekerja sama dengan HR dalam pengembangan karir staf serta pemilihan staf TI barud. Bekerja sama dengan tim Legal dan HR dalam pembuatan kebijakan TIe. Bekerja sama dengan procurement dalam pengadaan inventory TIB. Eksternala. Bekerja sama dengan vendor dalam pembuatan aplikasi (jika diperlukan) b. Bekerja sama dengan konsultan dalam pengembangan, solusi serta peningkatan kinerja departemen TI (Teknologi Informasi)c. Bekerja sama dengan Internet provider dalam pengelolaan internet dan telekomunikasi

Syarat : 

Usia maks 30 tahun
Pendidikan minimal SMA sederajat
Berkepribadian baik dan mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik

Membantu pelanggan menemukan barang di toko.

Memberi tahu pelanggan tentang fitur produk dan menunjukkan cara penggunaannya.
Menginformasikan pelanggan mengenai diskon dan promosi.
Membantu proses pembayaran.
Menyampaikan keluhan pelanggan kepada manajemen.
